name: mp3gain.js
description: port of mp3gain in javascript, for use in browser
author: Yohan Boutin

scripts.build: npm run buildmp3gain && npm run buildbinary && npm run buildworker && npm run buildembed
scripts.buildworker: node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc -d  --target es5 --lib ES5,WebWorker --outFile dist/worker.js src/mp3gain/worker.ts && cat dist/worker.js > dist/mp3gain-worker.js && cat dist/mp3gain-bin.js >> dist/mp3gain-worker.js
scripts.buildembed: node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc -d  --target es5  --outFile dist/mp3gain-embed.js src/mp3gain/MP3GainEmbed.ts && node build-embed.js
